name: TetrisRun
description:
Game made for the Mix and Game Jam (2020)

Theme: 'Mixing Genres'.

Game that mixes the Endless Runner and Puzzle genres, based on Tetris.

You manage a piece of Tetris that moves infinitely forward. You have to control their position and rotation to fit the walls.

Get the highest score you can without crashing into the walls!

Controls Credits

Game made by @SimpleandClean_ and @Raulserranodev

Music by: @SimpleandClean
